tasks.title: ğŸ“… Daily: Extract Tasks from Calendar & Email
tasks.description:
Recurring task to pull actionable items from Google Calendar and emails into Mission Control.

**Schedule:**
- â° 8am: Daily (via OpenClaw cron)
- ğŸ” Scans next 36 hours
- ğŸ“‹ Creates tasks with auto-generated subtasks
- âœ… Uses MCP integration (Zapier)

**What gets extracted:**
- Google Calendar events (meetings, deadlines)
- Emails with task keywords (task, to-do, due, deadline, meeting, appointment, reminder)
- Meeting prep tasks
- Follow-up tasks

**Subtask generation:**
- For meetings: Prep agenda, attend, send notes
- For deadlines: Research, draft, finalize
- For tasks: Break into 2-3 actionable steps

**Implementation:** Uses mcporter + Zapier MCP to fetch calendar events and Gmail.

comments.author: Molty
comments.text: Cron job created. MCP integration implemented via mcporter + Zapier.

tasks.title: Restaurant Ideas
tasks.description: Send me a message with some dinner options for me and my wife. The location should be 20m drive or less

comments.author: Molty
comments.text:
Dinner options for Adam & Heather (within 20min drive from Peachtree Corners):

ğŸ½ï¸ **StÃ¤ge Kitchen & Bar** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)
- Steaks, seafood, pasta, global tapas & elevated sushi

- Upscale but relaxed atmosphere

ğŸŒŠ **Peche Modern Coastal** (Peachtree Corners - 5 min)

ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¹ **Trattoria one41** (Johns Creek - 10-12 min)

All options are highly rated and within easy driving distance!
